document_data.name: Ellywick Tumblestrum
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/The Legends of Adventures in the Forgotten Realms}}
document_data.mainbody: lywick Tumblestrum was known as the most powerful bard in the [[multiverse]]. She possessed a vast knowledge of many worlds across [[wildspace]]
document_data.Description: Ellywick Tumblestrum was known as the most powerful bard in the [[multiverse]]. She possessed a vast knowledge of many worlds across [[wildspace]]
document_data.Abilities: Through song and music, she had the ability to manipulate hearts and minds of sentient creatures, attract animals and even transform her surroundings.
document_data.Possessions: She has a ''[[deck of many things]]'' in her possession as well as a [[lute]].
document_data.Activities:
Ellywick travelled the Realms in the company of an adventurer party she formed. Members of the party included [[Hama Pashar]], [[Nadaar]] and [[Varis]].

She was a regular patron of the [[Witchlight Carnival]] and preferred drinking at the [[Feasting Orchard]].
document_data.History:
[[File:Ellywick Tumblestrum Borderless AFR.jpg|thumb|right|300px|''Ellywick playing to the an audience of animals and fey creatures.'']]
She gained her powers from a ''[[wish]]'' spell from a lucky draw from her ''deck of many things''.{{Cite web/The Legends of Adventures in the Forgotten Realms}}
